VFEPirates.WarcasketDef.label: 501st Crusader Division armor
VFEPirates.WarcasketDef.shortDescription: This Warcasket is only entrusted to warriors who dedicate their whole lives to the emperor and the empire.
VFEPirates.WarcasketDef.description: This Warcasket is only entrusted to warriors who dedicate their whole lives to the emperor and the empire. With a powerful jet pack and nearly impenetrable armor that few things can pierce, many have come to fear the sight of this armor. While this armor is a rare sight it is most commonly issued to troops on key worlds or on the frontlines of very important battles.
